HOw do i attach the subs when using a WD media player ???? Been an ongoing issue. please help!
ive got a wd just name the srt file exactly the same name as the movie file and open from the options menu on wd and it has to be the exact same name just copy and paste the same to the srt file
i nearly forgot dont change .srt part on the end the file extension must stay the same

pro346pro. Thanks a billion. Muchos apprecios'o,, or something.. And the wd media player is the best thing since sliced bread, is it not??? i spent forever trying to figure out what torrents would play on my smart tv(nd not many did). believe it or not it would play the Matrasoka and MP4 but not Dolby audio files which is what most x264/matrasoka are. So you can imagine my fustration. And converting...... Fucking forget about it!!!!!! so if your a pirate with something better than the WD media player. I WOULD DEFINITELY LOVE TO LEARN ABOUT IT.
